v.v: Yahweh, when you are angry with me,
Now it is as though you have shot your arrows at me and wounded me;
Because you have been angry with me,
All my sins are like a flood that covers my head;
Because I have done foolish things,
Sometimes I am bent over, and sometimes I lie prostrate;
My body is burning with fever,
I am completely exhausted, and I have no strength.
Yahweh, you know that I desire you to heal me;
My heart pounds heavily, and all my strength is gone.
My friends and neighbors stay away from me because of my sores;
Those who want to kill me set traps to catch me;
Now I act like a deaf man and do not listen to what they say.
I act like a man who does not answer when people talk to him
But Yahweh, I trust in you.
I said to you, “Do not cause me to die so that my enemies will rejoice!
I say that because I am about to fall down,
I confess the wrong things that I have done;
My enemies are healthy and strong;
Those who do evil things to me in return for my doing good things to them
Yahweh, do not abandon me!
Lord, you are the one who saves me;

v: do not rebuke me and punish me!
it is as though you have struck me and knocked me down.
I am suffering great pain.
Because of my sin,
my whole body is diseased.
they are like a load that is very heavy; I cannot carry them.
I have sores that have become worse, and they stink.
I mourn all day.
and I am very ill.
I am very distressed in my inner being, and I groan with pain.
you hear me while I am groaning.
I am no longer able to see well.
even my own family stays far from me.
those who want to harm me discuss the ways that they can get rid of me;
they plot against me all day.
I act like a man who cannot talk, and I say nothing to reply to them.
because he cannot hear anything.
My Lord God, you will answer me.
If troubles overwhelm me, my enemies will do very bad things to me!”
and I constantly have pain.
I am very sorry for the sins that I have committed.
there are many people who hate me for no reason.
oppose me because I try to do what is right.
My God, do not stay far from me!
Quickly come and help me!
